name: FeedItem
description: Represents a single feed item in a Chatter feed.
summary:
The `FeedItem` object in Salesforce represents an individual post or update within the Chatter feed. Here's a summary of its attributes:

1. **Identifiers and References:**
   - `Id` (ID): Unique identifier of the feed item.
   - `ParentId` (Reference): ID of the parent record that the feed item is associated with.
   - `CreatedById`, `LastEditById`, `InsertedById` (Reference): IDs of the users who created, last edited, and inserted the feed item, respectively.
   - `RelatedRecordId`, `BestCommentId` (Reference): IDs of the related record and the best comment on the feed item, respectively.

2. **Dates and Timestamps:**
   - `CreatedDate`, `LastModifiedDate`, `SystemModstamp`, `LastEditDate` (DateTime): Timestamps for creation, last modification, system last modification, and last edit, respectively.

3. **Content and Format:**
   - `Type` (Picklist): Type of the feed item (e.g., TextPost, LinkPost, etc.).
   - `Title` (String): Title of the feed item.
   - `Body` (Textarea): Main content or body of the feed item.
   - `LinkUrl` (URL): URL if the feed item is a link post.
   - `IsRichText` (Boolean): Indicates whether the feed item is in rich text format.

4. **Engagement and Status:**
   - `CommentCount`, `LikeCount` (Integer): Number of comments and likes on the feed item.
   - `HasContent`, `HasLink`, `HasFeedEntity`, `HasVerifiedComment` (Boolean): Flags indicating the presence of content, link, feed entity, and verified comment, respectively.
   - `IsDeleted`, `IsClosed` (Boolean): Flags indicating whether the feed item is deleted or closed.
   - `Status` (Picklist): Current status of the feed item.

5. **Versioning:**
   - `Revision` (Integer): Revision number of the feed item.

These attributes collectively define the properties and behavior of a feed item within the Salesforce Chatter feed.
label: Feed Item
